law.text: Each public or private elementary or secondary school shall report immunization results to its local health department in accordance with regulations promulgated by the Cabinet for Health and Family Services.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 131, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 302, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1998; and ch. 426, sec. 114, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. IV, sec. 198, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 128, sec. 2.
